code:
gantt
    title Black Friday 2017 Crisis Timeline
    dateFormat HH:mm
    axisFormat %H:%M
    
    section Normal Operation
    System Running Normally    :done, 00:00, 08:00
    
    section Crisis Begins
    Traffic Spike Starts        :crit, 08:00, 08:30
    First Service Failures      :crit, 08:30, 09:00
    Cascade Failures Begin      :crit, 09:00, 10:00
    
    section Full Outage
    34 Services Down            :crit, 10:00, 12:00
    Database Pool Exhaustion    :crit, 10:30, 12:30
    Message Queue Backlog 2.3M  :crit, 11:00, 13:00
    
    section Recovery
    Emergency Rollback          :active, 12:00, 13:00
    Partial Service Restored    :active, 13:00, 14:00
    Full Recovery               :done, 14:00, 15:00
    
    section Impact
    Revenue Loss $4.7M          :milestone, 14:00, 0m

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 主架构 这一块。
等等，我重新想了一下，应该是 主架构处理 才对。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 '主架构处理'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
